name: Village2 - Windows Version
description:
This is a small experimental app created to test modular architectural elements and runtime material editing.

There's also a browser version available, with lower quality graphics: https://lexferreira89.itch.io/village2-browser

This is part of the development for my new project, a city-building/strategy game featuring customizable, modular units and buildings. If you're interested in my projects, please visit my patreon: https://patreon.com/lexferreira89

3D assets and code all made by me. Placeholder textures made by https://3dtextures.me/ 3D made in Blender. Game developed in Godot.

Source code and 3D models available at:

https://patreon.com/lexferreira89

https://gumroad.com/lexferreira89

Made by LexFerreira89 - September 2020
